name: Brave Heart
flower_description: A simple flower brooch that is a keepsake from someone's first adventure.
feather_description: A shimmering feather from a songbird that brings a nudge of courage to its wearer.
sand_description: A dated miniature hourglass that serves no practical purpose. It seems as elusive as time itself.
goblet_description: A crude wooden vessel filled only with memories.
circlet_description: A rough-and-ready laurel wreath that seems as precious as a king's golden crown.
four_pc_bonus: Increases DMG by 30% against opponents with more than 50% HP.
